website_summaries.verdict: This small-but-sturdy portable washing machine works as well as most full-size models.
pros: With a 0.9-cubic-foot interior, this is one of the smaller washers on the market
Customers praise its robust construction and thorough washing
Leaves clothes nearly dry after spin cycle
cons: Assembly can be challenging, and some customers reported leaks

customer_reviews.title: Bad!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This washing machine leaves the clothes very well washed but makes a lot of noise and often crashes and does not continue washing and vibrates a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer! I hooked it right up to my kitchen sink and then store it in my closet. In the first two days, I used it 6 times because I was so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great product with even better customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Washer works great and is a bit smaller than I expected! It's super easy to set up by yourself (may need a bit of help getting it up flights of stairs) and tested with detergent pods without an issue. I have this installed in the basement and the biggest tip I have for people is to buy a diverter with an aerator so that you won't have to unscrew the hose every time to use it. It does come with a quick adapter, but I find the water that comes out very inefficient. The following are non-sponsored links: Diverter I used:  Adapter used:
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Was able to get in touch with customer service who replaced my machine quickly and professionally. It now works perfectly (cleans really well, as well!). Changed my rating from 1 to 5 stars. Thank you! THIS STOPPED WORKING LITERALLY IN THE 1st CYCLE. Attempts to contact the company have yet to be fruitful. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: Swamp kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was originally happy with this washing machine. But a couple of weeks ago when I was using it, it started filling, and then never stopped filling. I couldn't even empty it. I ended up with it flooding my kitchen. I've completely given up on having a washing machine. This is the second one I've had, and they just don't work. I was initially very happy with this machine, but now I am just so angry. I've wasted a fortune just to have some place to do my laundry. And I've got nothing to show for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price, convenient and well made washer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little washer! It's super easy to set up and use. We needed a little adapter to fit our faucet but we got that at home depot. If you have a smaller faucet I would recommend you get a 3/4 in adapter to fit the coupler. The washer is really quiet even on the spin cycle. I highly recommend that you make sure it's level to ensure it runs smoothly and quietly. It drains fast and you can choose how many wash, rinse and spin cycles you want and for how long. Wash up to 15 minutes and rinse and spin cycle up to 5 each. Very great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Larson

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was The best money I ever spent washes well it fairly quiet and does an amazing job !!... But now a week later it's leaking everywhere from the back. I had massive surgery Nov 4th and cannot lift or carry it to return it. Doesn't wash many things either like 3 shirts shorts and a towel would be one load
customer_reviews.author: honey

customer_reviews.title: I was nothing before this little washer
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know what I was doing with my life before this washer. I mean dragging my body out of bed early on Saturday mornings to fight over machines at Washer World...nuts! There was hardly any assembly. It's light enough to move around just be careful with the wheels are rolling. This bad boy cleans clothes perfectly too. I purchased an "Y" adapter at Lowe's to hook it up to both hot and cold water otherwise you have to choose just one temp to wash in. All in all, I'm extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. Fills up with water but did nothing else. Tried on several occasions, but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Gyna709

customer_reviews.title: Low quality washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. Got a burning smell from the washing machine after first use. Does not clean clothes well and an elderly person would find it difficult to operate. (No directions). Returned.
customer_reviews.author: IamNOTaSTUPIDbot

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on Amazon EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing I’ve EVER purchased on Amazon!! And I buy a LOT of stuff. I have a very small apartment and this is everything I needed for my space. It hookup directly to my bathroom sink and it discharged into my tub. ***The fill hose only attaches to faucets where the threads are on the outside of the spout. Just like a garden hose*** I am extremely happy with the purchase. Both for how it performs, the ease of being able to move it around as needed and the inexpensive cost of the unit. If this this broke tomorrow I’d buy it again!!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Love my new washing machine
customer_reviews.text: I received today and have already completely washed all my clothes. My apartment complex has a washer and dryer, but the washer never works so I used this to wash and used the apartment dryer. Very easy to use and does a great job cleaning your clothes. Pretty quiet as well. Update:. The hinge on the door just broke so it's off the hinge. Still works but not sure for how long as operation depends on door being closed. I'm frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: jamboydc

customer_reviews.title: Truly Apartment Size Washing Machine
customer_reviews.text: This small wonder has allowed my daughter to forego the trips to the laundromat, which for her is no minor convenience. Of course as washers go it’s limited in capacity, but she is petite and her things are small, so overall this machine is appropriate. Even more appreciated, by having this washer available, my daughter, who has back and hip pain, doesn’t have to carry a cart or basket up & down stairs, or be concerned about going down the street after getting off work. It’s cost was slightly more than the smaller machine she considered first, but with the rust resistant drum, multiple speeds and other adjustments, she’s delighted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hauch

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for quarantine times!
customer_reviews.text: This washer is amazing. Does a great job at washing. The spinner is very quiet. I had to buy longer water supply and drain hose for my set up. The ones that came with it was a little too short. Washer is a perfect size for our studio. I use HE liquid detergent and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not that portable, not that small
customer_reviews.text: They call those wheels? They are absolutely useless, so if you aren’t strong and you were wanting to be able to move this in and out of a closet, good luck. The hose will barely reach any faucet. And it came used????? The lid had soap film on it and the bottom of the tub had dried up muddy dirt.
customer_reviews.author: R & J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my new little washing machine! It is super easy to lift, move, level, and store in a closet. Hoses are good quality and simple to hook up. It effectively cleans loads consisting of: 2 large towels, king size sheet, 3-4 shirts, 3 pants, 1 dozen pairs of socks, or even a crocheted lap blanket. Spin function works great. Quiet and smooth running. Computerized functions are sufficient for various cycles. Mahalo!
customer_reviews.author: Tutu

customer_reviews.title: LIVES UP TO THE HYPE!
customer_reviews.text: As two senior citizens, the washer meets our needs very well; however, My one complaint is that the Instruction book had very small print. we have a magnifing glass, so we were able to read it. It was a real irritation- we wanted to see if it lived up to the hype: IT DOES! The booklet problem can be and should be corrected quickly. l9-20-2019; Mike Rowe, Sun City, AZ
customer_reviews.author: roweazmike

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: This washer is automatic. Just connect it to you water system and you can leave it. You can connect it to your bathroom sink.Everything you need to operate thus washer comes in the box. .Make sure the drain hose is secured to avoid flood on your floor. This does not cone with a dryer but once your clothes are done, you can just hang dry them. Definitely worth it! It saves you the trip to the laundry mat.. I’m very satisfied with this washer. It can wash half of standard size laundry basket.?This company has excellent customer service. I definitely recommend this washer.
customer_reviews.author: Be H

customer_reviews.title: Can be filled manually if unable to attach hoses.
customer_reviews.text: There is a small learning curve on learning to use it compared to something simple like a commercial washer, but it does a good job getting my fabrics clean. The spin cycle can be tricky, going off-balance easily, especially with heavy fabrics like towels. The lint filter and pump filter are easy to clean and service. Has nice splash-resistant controls. Isn't too heavy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product can literally change your life!
customer_reviews.text: I love EVERYTHING about this machine! It cleans clothes/towels/sheets so well! It is quiet, uses hardly any soap and I can do laundry any time of the day/night. No more trips to the laundry mat! It has literally bettered the quality of my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: when you need clean close but you cant/dont wanna go outside
customer_reviews.text: set-up is tricky for people who have no working knowledge of plumbing but simple enough once you stare at it for 20 mins. once it is in working order absolutely 5 stars. variable settings, high efficiency and easy to understand. i would recommend reading all instructions and having all tools required available. oh and if anyone has a stuck aerator wd40 does work dreams for getting it off to attach tubing
customer_reviews.author: milo

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver, and probably my favorite purchase from Amazon EVER. My clothes actually feel cleaner than washing it in the laundromat. My only regret is not buying this sooner. I have been using this for probably about 6 months and have had no issues with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Elky

customer_reviews.title: Washtub leaked on first use
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival :( Flooded my bathroom floor. Would’ve been a great product for small space if it wasn’t poorly made in China
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, it leaks and doesn't drain properly, seems like it is coming out of the unit and not the hose
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for scrubs or baby clothes!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my RV. When not using it there, I use it to wash my scrubs. I work in a hospital and am in isolation rooms. I don’t want to mix my scrubs with family laundry. It is a big washer in miniature. Does an excellent job washing and spins very dry. It’s easy to use and store. A friend got one for her baby clothes. I will always have one of these machines! You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Blessed with this handy machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine works wonders. Better effective then the last one I had. I purchased warranty also just in case. This washer is also a spin dryer for those that ask. It is very quiet does not shake to the max. It leaves the clothes a little damp but will quickly air dry. Perfect for small loads of garments. If you have kids and constantly wash clothes you can save money with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy lagoa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic small washing machine. Its just as good if not better then a regular size washer. The hook up is easy. I was able to hook it up to my kitchen sink with the parts supplied. No leaks, no issues at all. Its for small loads. I washed two pair of jeans and 3 polo shirts and it was fine. But thats the most you can do. I've also washed a bunch of socks and underwear with great results. Uses very little detergent. For small spaces and perhaps one or two adults I'd very highly recommend. It's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Precipitation in panel and the quick release adapter broke
customer_reviews.text: This has been working off and on with a LOT of noise. Sounds like a jet plain taking off. The panel get condensation build up living particles on water in the display. Gets off balance lots, and makes loud noises when spinning. The quick connector adapter broke after three months of use, and now it is no longer made. I was told from home labs fill your washer up manually. Your kidding right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water precipitation on the painel
customer_reviews.text: Its working well I mean this machine clean very well the clothes, but since the first time I used it there is water precipitation in the painel. It's getting harder to see the number. I hope the machine keep working despite of this water precipitation. Check out the video and photos
customer_reviews.author: Emanuelle

customer_reviews.title: Is easy to move if necessary, weighs around 50lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is great for RV’s or Apartments. I bought it for small amount of clothing instead of running a full size washer all the time. Remember it only has a 9 lb compacity your larger Comforters and blankets will still need to be washed in a standard washer.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E. Schlitt

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: So far it works very well and I love that it doesn’t take up alit of space.
customer_reviews.author: Dhubter

customer_reviews.title: poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This washing machine has one main design shortcoming and one flaw. The shortcoming is that it only offers cold water wash, which is insufficient in many cases. Its design flaw is that the draining hose which is supposed to be hooked over the edge of your sink can, in fact, easily fall on the floor and then the machine will flood the area where it is installed. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tsynkov

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: We got this a few months back and it's brilliant. We don't connect the hose to fill it up but open up the top and fill it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Graymatter

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. But it leaks water when it’s spinning time
customer_reviews.text: It’s been leaking why I don’t know I’m concern other than that it’s still working fine I hope it last
customer_reviews.author: Concern customer

customer_reviews.title: Great washer with huge flaw for second-home use
customer_reviews.text: The hOmeLabs Portable Washing Machine is a lovely little machine that would be perfect for apartment dwellers or others in small spaces. We bought a unit for our mountain cabin. Unfortunately, the washer has a huge flaw for our purposes: It cannot be subjected to temperatures below 32F. Our cabin gets that cold when we are away during the winter months. hOmeLabs has not been able to provide a solution. This is frustrating, because I otherwise love the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Godzillabird

customer_reviews.title: Fake review warning
customer_reviews.text: This is piece of sxxx!!!! My bathroom is all wet and water is not even fill it in the inside tank. All the water is came out from bottom.... Omg! Too heavy to trash out! Wasting my time & money !!!!
customer_reviews.author: seunghee

customer_reviews.title: Please save your money and get something worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine and a few days later had to call the company because it was leaking . I received a new one , no problems until my Third wash where the water kept draining and holding it in order to activate the washing cycle . I am upset because it was a lot of money to have 2 machines fail in a matter of days .
customer_reviews.author: NOUEL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed during Quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: I literally love this thing so much. No joke. I haven’t been this excited about something in a while. California is COVID central and I am in a small condo with no laundry. No more! This seriously is such a little beast, if you are considering getting it, do. I’m so impressed with how well it runs, how much it handles. And it’s versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great washer for an RV operates like a big washer!
customer_reviews.text: We are full time RV’ers and I have been going to laundry mats nor am years now. We will be doing allot more remote camping this year so I wanted my own washer! Did allot of research I liked the reviews, the fact that this machine is fully automatic and the size! Used it today for the first time and I am beyond happy. It washes like a normal size washer. The clothes come out ready to hang and it is extremely quiet! I am very impressed and happy with this washer!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 34 foot RV. This fits aboard easily it cleans the clothes well, does it use much water and spins them almost dry. No need for a dryer, wash the clothes at night, hang them up and they are dry by morning most of the time. It only uses powdered detergent, which seems to work better than liquid. Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Knox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: My 4-unit building does not have a laundry room so I have had to go to the laundromat for the past few years and did not think about looking into an appliance like this. I was originally going to buy one of the washer/spin dryer combo machines but with two dogs at home, I decided to purchase this and the hOmeLabs portable dryer. I am so pleased with my purchase. The washer fits a decent amount of clothes and allows me to now multi-task at home while doing laundry.
customer_reviews.author: rpants91

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work 😭
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box I could tell it had previously been used. It was leaking water and the spinner was filthy. I still hooked it up thinking no big deal, I'll clean it up. Nope wouldn't turn on. Highly disappointed. So of course I find the number to home labs. Call, explain. They told me to wait 48 hours to see if it still wont turn on then call back. LMAO! Wait for what? Magical fairies to swoop in and fix it?! Thank god Amazon refunded me! Maybe it is a good washer and I just so happened to get a crappy returned one? Sucks I had such high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: FeistyCapricorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This small washer is absolutely awesome! Everything that is needed to get the wash machine connected is included and the set up takes 5-10 mins. It washes clothes clean and fast, making doing laundry a pleasure. Lastly, the clothes are almost dry after the spin cycle! This machine was a great find especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ROB 9380

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits about 2-3 towels at a time to give a reference of capacity. I live alone and I have been able to keep up with my laundry by using this product a few times a week. I do have this on a caster for easy movement. This is a game-changer and has made my daily living more enjoyable if I stain a shirt I don't have to worry about when the next time I can get to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: sahara

customer_reviews.title: Really great for a small apartment with no dedicated plumbing
customer_reviews.text: This is really a lovely little washing machine for apartments with limited space. Shipped immediately, very easy to install in a standard faucet and just gets the job done. For anyone like myself that has very little space (in the kitchen or bathroom) and no dedicated plumbing this is absolutely a no-brainer. I just hope it also actually lasts. P.S. shipped immediately and for questions etc. reaching out to the seller they were very courteous and helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great washer
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for a small space! My sister and I live in a two bedroom condo, and we have a horrible common laundry room with machines broken all the time, so this washer is a life saver for us! We had it for two weeks now. Pros: easy to use, easy to attach hose (it comes with adapter for your faucet), washing really well, using a little detergent Cons: so far only 1, and it’s for women only 😋 make sure to put your lace undies in a laundry bag, it’s spinning pretty hard at the end and might tear them
customer_reviews.author: Daria Desilets

customer_reviews.title: Worthless. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. I have shared laundry with a healthcare worker. I bought this to get me through the quarantine. It is worthless. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet and performs an amazing job. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit and I stood there and watched it during the entire cycle. I also documented the time frames each cycle occurred. I made minor adjustments to tie down the hose and I needed to purchase additional washers to have an exact fit but the cost was less than $2.00. I love this machine and I make sure that it is not overloaded! Simply fantastic for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awasome!!Love Love Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love"..i rolled my Roper Full size washer to the curb..An Bought this Wonderful Washer..It washes Better Than A Standard washer..It took Me 5 Min to hook it up..where my Standard washer was!! I do hv washer hookup! An couldnt Afford A Standard Washer! I love this Washer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper!

customer_reviews.title: Compact and not very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is very compact and is perfect for a trailer. Purchased this for our camping trailer when we go camping and don’t want to pack much. I was nervous on the size but it fit perfect!! Only needed one person to load it.
customer_reviews.author: Californiagirl

customer_reviews.title: Larger capacity than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality for the price. No problem washing a crib sheet with a couple of baby pajamas. Spin dry superiorly! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Trash!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely trash! I’ve bought two portable washers for $150 that have lasted me a year. Thinking Id get longer life out of a more expensive washer, I purchased this one! It’s just trash! It washed for like one minute... sits still for 5.. washes again another one minute... then nothing. It’s a Struggle to even get it to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Walls

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small apartment like the Bay Area. I refused to pay an additional 300-500 dollars month on a unit with a washer dryer. And laundromats can cost up to 10 dollars per load here. This was my solution!!! You may have to pretreat your workout clothes with vinegar to completely get them smelling good. Some of my older shirts still smelled the first time I tried out the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great mini washing machine...
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It's so convenient and works really well. I connected it to my shower hose and set it up to drain right into the shower drain using a piece of PVC pipe. The instructions indicate the drain hose has to be at least 32" from the ground.
customer_reviews.author: F.N. Los.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s really small and efficient. Awesome spin cycle. Just remember it’s not meant for hot/warm water or bleach. It says in the pamphlet.I absolutely love it. It did have a minor issue. The normal cycle wouldn’t work but the rest was fine. Two year warranty and costumer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Let my clothes REALLY clean
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases ever. This machine works really well for both washing and spinning. It has different cycles you can adjust. My clothes are finally clean after being using the machines from my building. I love the size, the amount of clothes I can put in (even my shits), the functions and the light weight. I use it connect to the faucet and when I don't need it I put it in a closet I have on the hallway of my apartment. I reccomend this washing machine if you are looking for some good quality and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelein Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just little smaller than what I except. Nothing more than 4 sweatshirts put in the machine But as for now I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: jinjoopr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to put in my RV so we could wash our clothes. It works great. It holds a handful of clothes and gets them nice and clean. I’m very pleased with this purchase. It does just what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We live in a small apartment and this is a lifesaver! We are also expecting and I’m so happy that we can wash the baby clothes separately in private. We initially bought the other popular Giantex older model, but it arrived late, damaged and wet (very disappointing). I was a bit unsure when I then ordered this homelabs washer. But it arrived quickly and was super easy to assemble and use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: This product may be small in size but it does a heck of a job! If you have a hamper it will take about 3-4 loads when its full and rapid mood we have found is best (19 mins) we were starting to get bummed out about our apartment weve been im for 3 years because there was no washer or dryer, well this did the trick! Shouldve bought years ago! Clothes are amazingly clean!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of these small washing machines, but this thing works great! It gets my clothes cleaner than larger washing machines and it leaves them dryer than most machines I've used. I'm using this in my RV, but I would also consider using it in a house. The machine is well built and the controls make sense and work without a lot of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cauthorn

customer_reviews.title: Well made and better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and perfect for small spaces. Works well and clothes comes out nice and clean
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It’s good , but can only wash small amounts . If u have no choice and have a small space this would be perfect . My only issue is that it leaks water .
customer_reviews.author: Rajaa

customer_reviews.title: Generally a great product, but ...
customer_reviews.text: 1) The drain pipe does stay well on the sink, due to its design. So I normally put a tape on it. One time that I forgot, it flew off the sink onto the floor and made a complete mess in my apartment. 2) The spin dryer makes noise most of the time, even with medium/light load. Other than these, it does its job, and is a good option for small apartments that don't have proper washing machine installed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sohrab Saeb

customer_reviews.title: Short lived.
customer_reviews.text: This little portable washer did the job. I was able to do 2 loads of clothing. Very simple and easy. However unfortunately for me I didn’t have such a great experience as it broke on the first day. I was able to do two loads but by the third load it wouldn’t start. It made a very weird noise and wouldn’t drain the water out. I reached out to the company with a video attached if the malfunction. They will be sending me a new washer. I shall review in a couple of days once I am able to start using the new machine.
customer_reviews.author: Janelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best 200 I ever spent. I hope it lasts! It fits my king size fitted sheet with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: saved my life. because of covid19 our laundromats were closed so we decided to get this washer. zero regrets wished I owned one many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Wender M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apt lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: We connected an adapter to our showerhead and placed in our bathroom (behind the door and next to the tub, where it can also drain into). It fits really well in the small space, it's quiet and everything comes out clean. We were really skeptical at first, but wanted to give it a try. Since we pay a lot per load anyway, we figured it would pay for itself really quickly. It's also nice to have the freedom to use it whenever, since our laundry room hours are limited and I often work late.
customer_reviews.author: kissene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: WE HAD SO MUCH NOISE THAT THE NEIGHBOR'S COULD HEAR IT.IT SOUNDED LIKE A JACK HAMMER CALLED SUPPORT AND FOUND OUT I SHOULD UNPLUG AND WAIT 4 TO 6 HOURS AND PLUG BACK IN. WE DID THIS AND UNBELIEVABLE, IT IS QUIET. THANKS FOR THE FIX W O W (about a month later)...spoke to soon !!! about a week After it started again and nothing works...sent request to replace it or get me something else. this machine is not good...do not buy one.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES A GOLDSMITH sr

customer_reviews.title: There’s a learning curve, but it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doing laundry in my building is a huge hassle, so this washing machine was a game changer. I also have some executive dysfunction issues, and knowing I have my own washer and can just deal with my inevitable mess easily is a godsend. Seriously, I would recommend this thing to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Match295

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Little Washer! Don't hesitate, you will like this washer. Cleaned great. Rinsed all soap from clothes. Spins the clothing really well so they line dry quickly. And if you have a question customer service is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Scottswife

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective and would not hold water at all as the water filled up it came right out the drainage hose and wasted water
customer_reviews.author: Tianna tettis

customer_reviews.title: Small and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this fits in my small apartment and I got a base with wheels for it. I have used many times since I bought it, is worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this machine a few days. So far it works great had to buy an adapter to fit my faucet that was no problem and enjoying very clean clothes.
customer_reviews.author: robert hanley

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! This item is underpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Magnificently designed white with light gray and silver detailing. Glass lid. Wheels. Quiet. Fully automatic. Snap on adapter remains on your faucet. No leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Towers2000

customer_reviews.title: I love my washer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces!! It washes really good!! Easy to use and looks elegant!!
customer_reviews.author: Jadira Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Best for the size
customer_reviews.text: Washes great, rinses great space saver. So thankful I found it. I have an old fashioned faucet and the hose fits. I have it now for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: qnsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Amazing washer can handle at least three changes of clothes saves me a lot of money vs going to a laundry mat at my NYC apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine I use it for my pet laundry and kitchen and utility towels. Simple hookup and quiet operation glad I made this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: blasianGyrl

customer_reviews.title: Shakes violently
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like it and it would be great if... the inner barrel didn't violently shake, like LOUDLY and so violently it moves the washer around the floor and chips off bits of plastic from the inside of the case into my laundry. It seems like I got a defective machine.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very good small washer.
customer_reviews.text: Great small washer for our RV. Works just like a regular size washer. I’m impressed by the spin cycle, which does a good job wringing the water out of the clothes. Clothes are clean. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little washer.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this washer. I'm a single male, the load size is a little small but I just do several loads. Cleans very good. It comes with everything needed including adapter for your sink.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher c.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought Homelabs washer and dryer for my RV. They fit perfectly in the closet. I was nervous since I never try the portable versions before. However, to my surprise they works wonderfully. Going on 5th month now, we don’t have any problem. I love the rapid wash feature... 20 mins for a wash? Hell yeah! Thank you for the invention! Worth every penny and more!
customer_reviews.author: THUY-KHE  DUONG  NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: breaking noises during spin
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked great for a few weeks but suddenly it started to make very strange noises when it dry spins and I have to stop it because it is the sound of crackling or something which is probably breaking. It is still working fine in the wash cycle but when it goes to dry and spins fast it is completely broken. I don't know what to do or how to fix or return it in this pandemic situation.
customer_reviews.author: ladan amin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: relatively small-- does decent job. easy to use. pretty easy to move-- though I put it on a small dolly that really helps it even further....
customer_reviews.author: Brent J. Trembath

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this. I can wash 2 pairs of jeans and a shirt, maybe some underwear pretty easily. I really cake grease into my pants so I was worried that it wouldn't be able to handle it, but it works just as well as a full size washer.
customer_reviews.author: andres ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This machine blew my mind. I recommend it if you're living in an apartment and don't have space for a full size washer. This machine is high quality all around and comes with everything you need. Will update if things change
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything needed to use right out of the box! Packaged well, delivered on time and super easy to use! It’s ideal for my space. Love this portable machine, now I don’t have to drag stuff to laundromat. I’m looking to purchase the dryer that’s made by this company to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but....
customer_reviews.text: Little black feet broke off when I first moved it across the floor. Should be a WARNING to move it by the rear wheels, which I didn't klnow about. Cleaned clothes well.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This has been hands down one of my best purchases! We purchased this for our RV, it’s so easy to use & washes like a charm. We contacted customer service because our first washer was missing a piece. They immediately sent us a new washer, woooow what GREAT customer service!! Our washer is amazing, we couldn’t be happier with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazongal

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a dream for 2 whole months. Then started leaking. Conveniently my warranty was up after 30 days. And customer service has yet to respond to my calls and emails.
customer_reviews.author: Pimpin Tarentino

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: Water leaks into the tub when not in use, but otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Turverey

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver.
customer_reviews.text: The washer did arrive with a small crack on rubber above tub. But it will not affect its efficiency. There is a bit of a learning curve and I wish directions were clearer. I will watch the YouTube.com video another purchaser suggested. Otherwise, we believe the washer will be great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Coate

customer_reviews.title: Great little washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little washer. It cleans well and spins all the water from the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, i am so glad i got it!
customer_reviews.author: janet1255

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is my 2nd portable washer. First one was a little cheaper and broke down. So, I decided to give another try with this brand. I think I’m in love super quiet and does and amazing job washing my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia mcnair

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little washing machine. Perfect size for my apt, works well and spins for a long cycle almost drying clothes completely. Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Get one; I have two
customer_reviews.text: I have one at my apartment and one for my RV Honest review; worth it. Cleans well, filled with extendable faucet (not inclusive) twice per full cycle ; once for clean and once for rinse cycle... the final spin cycle damn near dries my clothes so that I can hang dry quickly :) like I said, I have 2.....
customer_reviews.author: @infiniteprana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm rooms and single unit apartments
customer_reviews.text: As a single person, this unit is perfect. Two loads per week and I have my sheets, towels and cloths washed! They wash and spin drys so well that I just let everything air dry over night. It runs quiet and the set up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new born baby. It was perfectly fit in my 0.5 bathroom and the toilet was still be able to use. It helped my family a lot! It could handle all of the baby’s cloth stuff. Noise was also low.
customer_reviews.author: McRee Zhao

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Portable Washing Machine - 6 Pound Load Capacity, 0.9 Cubic Foot Interior, Top Loading, 5 Wash Cycles, and LED Display - Perfect for Apartments, RVs and Small Space Living
feature_bullets: PORTABLE FULL AUTOMATIC WASHER - Relieve yourself from manual washing with our 0.9 cubic feet portable laundry washing machine. 44.1 pounds lightweight washer with fully automated washing, rinsing, and spinning cycles to protect the clothes even the most delicate wool. It also sports two roller wheels in the rear end for easy movement and effortless portability

LARGE WASH CAPACITY - Featuring a durable rust-resistant stainless steel drum for bearing loads up to 6 pounds clothes, perfect for delicate clothes or a small wash. With a variety of convenience features, it has a transparent viewing lid, adjustable legs, carry handles, water inlet, lint filter and drain pump which allows you to easily drain out dirty water

FLEXIBLE 5 CYCLES and 3 WATER LEVEL SETTINGS - 120-volt clothes cleaner offers five different washing programs such as Heavy, Gentle, Normal, Rapid and Soak and three water levels, as well which provides versatility and water savings. All programs, functions and selections are clearly labelled in touchpad control panel with blue LED digital display to help you to use the machine with ease

QUIET and ENERGY EFFICIENT - Electric washer and spinner is made to thoroughly washed, rinsed and spun your clothes; it runs at a mellow and efficient 200 watts input power with a quiet spin function. Each purchase comes complete with accessories which includes a quick connect adapter, water supply hose, and drain hose. Attaches quick to faucets and sinks

TOP LOAD COMPACT CLOTHES CLEANER - For small household with limited space and minimal laundry loads, this top loader machine is a good solution. It measures 17.7 L x 18.1 W x 31.5 H inches which allows to easily fit in the bathroom or closet. A great choice for apartments, college dorm rooms, RVs, camping or anywhere with limited space!
